Kate’s cancer diagnosis: Princess of Wales’ voice cracked as she shared her health update with the world https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/princess-of-wales-voice-cracked-as-she-shared-her-diagnosis-with-the-world/ZMFUD76KBFFXZAQ66BQIPRXA5Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/princess-of-wales-voice-cracked-as-she-shared-her-diagnosis-with-the-world/ZMFUD76KBFFXZAQ66BQIPRXA5Y/ Hannah FurnessKate's message will go down in history as one of the most moving royal broadcasts. Photo / Kensington Palace
